name: Verify LAD.r File and Raspberry Stamp Display
description: Validates that the LAD.r file appears after scanning the secret and displays a raspberry stamp image.
testObjective: Ensure secret file system rewards function correctly.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Secret has been scanned in camera view

steps.action: Check for LAD.r file in the file list
steps.expected: LAD.r file is present in the filesystem
Window closes and returns to filesystem view

postconditions: LAD.r file remains available in filesystem
Player can re-access the raspberry stamp
